name: Spiky (itch)
description:
Spiky is a Card, Platform, Puzzle game, with soothing graphics and a cute aesthetic, we made it for the Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam, it's my first one so go easy on me!

If you guys like it be sure to let me know so I can add more stuff in the future!

EDIT: So I kept working on the game! I just uploaded version 0.1.5, I just want to make sure that if someone wants to rate the Ludum Dare submission, that's version 0.1.1, not this one!  Anyway this are the changes amongst many others that I dont remember now,

  • Freeform camera (panning and zooming with the mousewheel)
  • Much improved UI with new designs
  • 17 new levels!
  • 1 new card 
  • Collectibles, diamonds and stars (which you have to carry to the portal in order to earn them)
  • Data progression, the game saves your diamonds, stars, settings and levels completed
  • Lots and lots of quality of life minor changes to make the experience smoother

Hope you guys like it and I appreciate any kind of feedback :)

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/spiky

Ludum Dare update 0.1.5 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/spiky/$95149
